pages.title: Disc
pages.text: One way to get a STAND comes from the ability of father pucci, the BOSS in the sixth installment of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure,white snake.$(li)Right - click to get the STAND information in the disc.$(li)It is currently only available from the chests of ender city and the desert temple.

pages.title: Tarot
pages.text: A means by which players can store avatars on their own, based on the tarot CARDS used for the divination of Avdol in the third episode of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure$(li)Right - click to get the STAND, stealth - right - click to remove STAND.

pages.title: Arrow
pages.text: The main path for getting the Stand.$(li)Right click to use$(li)In default case , there is a probability of 30% lead to fail , and you can change it in the config file.

pages.title: Arrow for requiem
pages.text: The means of evolution from stand to requiem.$(li)Right click to get requiem$(li)Currently there is no classical requiem available, but it can be used on Olga.

pages.title: Singularity
pages.text: The object of an evolutionary STAND, the point at which the universe condensed after it ended in acceleration, comes from the Father Pucci's principle of the circle.$(li)Right - click to enter the final trial, reaching the new world after the avatar completes evolution.

pages.title: STAND Ability
pages.text: Evolved to awaken, expending mental energy to release.
More functions are still in development, stay tuned.
